job description:
Our Research team continues to expound upon the work of our CEO’s PhD thesis. As a researcher at Pindrop, your work will make an immediate impact for today’s products and our future roadmap.

what you'll do
  • Work with customer data to build and tune machine learning models to catch anomalies in audio
  • Build upon Pindrop’s product and patent portfolio to advance machine learning models
  • Consistently tune model features in order to improve accuracy of our flagship fraud detection product
  • Spend time doing your own research in order to contribute to tweaks in the software or for future processes
  • In addition to fighting the bad guys, work in an environment that feeds innovation, supports learning, recognizes style, and rewards effort
who you are
  • Algorithm implementation in Python and C++
  • Fluent with scripting (Python preferred)
  • Fluent with the Linux command line (Ubuntu preferred)
  • Familiar with machine learning concepts, ideally with applied machine learning and/or data mining
  • Competent in at least one database system (MySQL preferred)
  • Able to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical parties
  • Strong communication skills and able to effectively communicate with external customers
  • MS degree minimum, PhD preferred
what we offer

As a part of Pindrop, you’ll have a direct impact on our growing list of products and thus the future of security in the voice driven economy. We hire great people and take care of them. Here’s a snapshot of benefits we offer:
  • Recognized top employer

    • 50 Startups That Will Boom in 2018
  • Health plans and 401k
  • Continued education budget
  • Flex schedules
  • Best in class tools
  • Paid commuter options
  • Fun outings to celebrate our accomplishments as a team
  • All the good karma you can rack up for fighting bad guys (our conference rooms are named after the ones we’ve busted)
who we are

Pindrop is a company founded on research and continues to innovate new ideas to market. Our solutions are leading the way to the future of voice by establishing the standard for security, identity, and trust. Pindrop products secure the future of voice, making technology more human from the call center to IoT devices.
